about_the_game:
Fatal Falls is an indie horror adventure that plunges players into a sinister, twisted world within the walls of a seemingly ordinary hotel named The Grand Elysium. Uncovering the mysteries of this place involves a journey through multiple chapters, each one peeling back a layer of deceit, horror, and the darkness hidden in plain sight. You must find clues and unlock puzzles to delve deeper, eventually confronting the hotel’s true nature — a place designed to ensnare those struggling with mental health.

Every interaction shapes your path and can lead to multiple possible outcomes. While most roads end in despair, only one path offers a chance to bring justice, if players uncover the right clues and avoid the clutches of a patrolling receptionist. Suspense builds as the protagonist faces unsettling therapy sessions with a strange psychologist, whose probing questions on mortality and depression blur the lines between sanity and madness...

Players must solve puzzles to access hidden rooms and unveil shocking truths about the hotel and its corrupt management. Tension heightens as you evade the ever-watchful receptionist. Will you expose the criminal organization pulling the strings, or will you find yourself ensnared by their dark secrets? With an immersive atmosphere, complex choices, and intense psychological themes, Fatal Falls explores the horrors of the mind and the terrifying consequences of falling too far into despair.

content_descriptors.notes: Fatal Falls contains strong adult themes such as mental illness and suicide and contains occassional strong use of gore which can be turned off. It is recommended only for players over 18.

short_description: In Fatal Falls you explore the dark secrets of "The Grand Elysium", a posh luxury hotel in the middle of nowhere. Interact with its guests, drink a cocktail at the bar, peruse the noble premises – the choice is yours! Just make sure you don't get entangled in the hotel's dark deeds...
